Capabilities.Title: Forward Online Capabilities
Capabilities.Line2: Access to banking products and services anywhere and at any time.
Capabilities.Line4: Functionality meets modern requirements of customers.
Capabilities.Line6: The system design is built on the basis of the intuitive preferences of the user. According to the standards of Material design of Android and IOS Human Interface Guidelines.

Functionality.Title: Functionality
Functionality.Line1: Self-registration in the system, the ability of the account management client
Functionality.Line2: Viewing Deposit products (including the files) with possibility of replenishment and open (WEB, mobile app)
Functionality.Line3: View existing credit products with the ability to make a payment for repayment
Functionality.Line4: View the minimum obligatory payment by credit card
Functionality.Line5: API-Services for CRM-systems: block, unlock and change the user's phone number
Functionality.Line6: The formation of statements of accounts of the user, display account statements (WEB, mobile, apps), the mechanism of the latest operations of the user-specific account, export / print statements
Functionality.Line7: Create and send Bank transfers between your accounts, by account number to the Bank's Clients, by phone number to Forward online users, saving templates of payment documents
Functionality.Line8: Map of branches and other points of presence of the Bank, with the possibility of laying the route and viewing detailed information. Edit data through the admin panel
Functionality.Line9: Automatic download of current exchange rates from the ABS, information on the current rates in the System (WEB, mobile app) with possibility of transition to a separate screen to display the change history of course
Functionality.Line11: Setting currency exchange rates MPs through the administrative part and their reflection in the System (WEB, mobile app)
Functionality.Line13: Authentication: username and password, fingerprint, OTP by SMS, FaceID (iOS only)
